column5: I am planning a weekend fishing trip and would like to know how thick the ice is on Timmins area lakes. I am thinking of bringing the kids out to Nighthawk lake.
Hmmm...Timmins, eh?  I'm guessing it's pretty thick!  You could always try calling up some of the local baitshops....
Get an extension on your auger!!
my bros got  a hut on nighthawk, they've been drivin trucks out there since mid-december, i think ur safe now LOL
Temagami is 18 inches at my dock.. 14 inches on the main lake. Probably similar a few hours up the road. About a foot of snow on the ice and LOTS and LOTS of slush !
